Class Scorecard

extends java.lang.Object
    This program creates and manages the scorecard CPSC 224 HW 4 No sources to cite

    Sami Blevens

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chooseScore(java.lang.String choice)
      takes an input and changes the scorecard.txt file to correspond with the value chosen and places the score, and sets the used value to yes.
      void createScorecard()
      creates a blank scorecard.txt file
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getUnusedScoresList()
      returns the ArrayList of the unused possible score lines
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> printPossibleScores()
      Sets the possible scores for the player to choose from based on the unused scorecard lines ArrayList
      void printScorecard()
      prints the scorecard board to an output file
      void readScorecard()
      reads the scorecard.txt file into an ArrayList of all current scores and an ArrayList of unused scorecard places
      void writeScorecard()
      reads the scorecard ArrayList and writes it to the scorecard.txt file
